lines.text: How come you get to go to Vegas for the weekend when I have to deliver those pictures?
Well, that's because you're just the click-click boy and I am the old bold pilot.
I could say something really nasty.
Why read the book? I saw the movie!

[up to Heaven]
If this red smudge don't come back, I'll forgive ya for this inconvenience.
I hope He appreciates your generosity.
